mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_ID, R.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, PARENT_ID, CONTENT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_TYPE = 1 AND PARENT_ID = R.REPLY_ID) AS commentCount, R.CREATE_DATE, R.UPDATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN USER U ON(R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) WHERE REPLY_TYPE = 0 AND PARENT_ID = #{boardId}

SELECT REPLY_ID, R.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, PARENT_ID, CONTENT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_TYPE = 1 AND PARENT_ID = R.REPLY_ID) AS commentCount, R.CREATE_DATE, R.UPDATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN USER U ON(R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) WHERE REPLY_TYPE = 1 AND PARENT_ID = #{replyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( USER_ID, PARENT_ID, CONTENT, REPLY_TYPE ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{replyType} )
